channel.title: Big Data in Biomedicine
channel.description: Recent content on Big Data in Biomedicine

item.description: I am a bioinformatic bachelor student, at the TUM and LMU, since summer 2018. Also, I had the opportunity to gather experience in information systems management and knowledge management at the TUM. In April 2020 I will be joining List Lab to work amongst other things on the R package of KeyPathWayMiner and my bachelor thesis.
